participants.name: Tony Orlando
participants.title: Senior Technical Recruiter and Proud Gold Sponsor of AITP Atlanta

messages.message:
Hi Brian,

Just a quick note to say thank you for connecting; it's a pleasure to meet you. If there is anything I can do for you, now or in the future, please don't hesitate to call or drop me a note.

Best Regards and Continued Success, 
Tony 

(678) 528-4721 
torlando@ehire.com
Congratulations Brian and Best of Luck!!
